org.apache.log.output.jms
Interface MessageBuilder

All Known Implementing Classes:
ObjectMessageBuilder, TextMessageBuilder
public interface MessageBuilder

Interface that classes implement to build JMS Messages.

Author:
Avalon Development Team, Peter Donald

Method Summary
 Message buildMessage(Session session, LogEvent event)
          Creation of a new message.
 

Method Detail

buildMessage

public Message buildMessage(Session session,
                            LogEvent event)
                     throws JMSException
Creation of a new message.

Parameters:
session - the session against which the message will be created
event - the log event
Returns:
the message
Throws:
JMSException - if a messaging error occurs
